name: Dana's Skillet Chicken Florentine
ingredients: 3 boneless chicken breasts or 6 chicken tenders (about 1 pound)

instructions.en: Season chicken with salt and pepper.
Heat 1 tablespoon butter in skillet over medium-high heat. Brown chicken 1.5-2 minutes per side, not cooking through. Remove to plate.
Add remaining butter to skillet. Add spinach and garlic; cook about 1 minute to heat.
Stir in cream and cheese. Season with salt and pepper. Spread spinach evenly in skillet.
Top spinach with chicken in a single layer.
Cover and simmer over low heat about 5 minutes or until chicken is cooked to your liking.
Serve chicken topped with spinach mixture.

notes: Makes 3 servings. Do not freeze. Fresh baby spinach (9 oz) can be substituted for frozen, but may need longer cooking time. Use high-quality parmesan cheese if possible.
